backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for salons, bookings, users, images, and seeds Swiss salons with default availability and services, integrating authorization and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files and components for build validation.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries of various frontend components, pages, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Thin root wrapper that imports and renders AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Main UI containing ETHEREAL FLOW layout, seed DATA, cards, badges, and interactive salon browsing logic.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the AuthHeader component.
Empty placeholder file for the CreateSalonForm component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MemberCard component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder file for the MonopolyModeSwitch component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MotionButton component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the PremiumBadge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for the ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder file for the ProSalonWizard component.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder file for the ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the RevenueChart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder file for the SalonListSection component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the VipDashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login using AuthClient, exposing identity, login flow state, and utility helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for future query-related React hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder hook file for salon image handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Main Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode, base styles, utilities, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry rendering App with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDashboardPage.t: Empty placeholder page for the client dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the login view.
frontend/src/pages/ProDashboardPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the professional dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for salon details.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing aura descriptions from salon form data using category, type, tags, and location.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Empty placeholder utility file for currency functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling themes, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing reset strategy, frontend redesign iterations, and known issues.
